mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where we believe you deserve everything without lifting a finger. Sign up now for our exclusive VIP treatment!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, standing in line at the coffee shop, patiently waiting for my morning latte like a regular person. Suddenly, my phone buzzes with an urgent email from my assistant-my private jet is experiencing mechanical issues, and I need to find an alternative mode of transportation to make it to my meeting in Paris in two hours!I immediately burst into a dramatic gasp, causing everyone in the coffee shop to turn and stare at me in awe. Without hesitation, I boldly demand that the barista stop all operations and call every car service in town to find me a chauffeur with a luxury vehicle to whisk me away to the airport.As the chaos ensues, I dramatically pace back and forth, barking orders to my assistant over the phone while sipping my half-prepared latte. Finally, a sleek black limousine pulls up in front of the coffee shop, and I graciously thank the barista for her swift action in saving my day.With a satisfied smirk, I step into the limo, leaving behind a trail of bewildered onlookers. As we speed towards the airport, I lean back in my plush seat, feeling entirely justified in my over-the-top reaction. After all, when you're Hot Josh, the world bends to your entitlement.
